ygData.subject: The noises of war....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Crotale continued to hear the sounds of battle from his hiding place in the Hidden One.  He stands and walks aroud when, or even if they will leavve.

::Crotale::
Crotale continued to hear the sounds of battle from his hiding place in 
the Hidden One.  He stands and walks aroud when, or even if they will 
leavve.
